_header: The Father of heaven from above
Note: First stanza almost identical with stanza 1 of 5328; stanza 9 is a variant of stanza 5 of 4126.
_description: A carol to the Trinity — ten quatrains (aaab) and Latin burden: ‘Te deum laudamus / Te dominum confitemur’

CULAdd7350.First Lines:
The ffather of heuyn from a boueHathe sent his son to our
                    behoueWhom all erthe is bownde to LoueTe deum Laudamus &
                        cetera…
CULAdd7350.Last Lines:
…ffrom the fendes both olde & yongEternally that we may
                        syngTe deum [laudamus Te dominum confitemur]
